name: Fallout 76: Atlantic City - Boardwalk Paradise: Deluxe Edition
summary: Bethesda Game Studios, the award-winning creators of Skyrim and Fallout 4, welcome you to Fallout 76. Twenty-five years after the bombs fell, you and your fellow Vault Dwellers—chosen from the nation's best and brightest - emerge into post-nuclear America on Reclamation Day, 2102. Explore a vast wasteland, devastated by nuclear war, in this open-world multiplayer addition to the Fallout story. Includes the full game and bonus High Stakes Bundle in-game items.
